title: Spicy Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender chicken, spices, and herbs, served with raita.

title: Veg Masala Dosa
description: Crispy South Indian dosa filled with spiced mashed potatoes, served with chutney and sambar.

title: Butter Chicken
description: Rich tomato-based curry with succulent chicken pieces, finished with cream and butter.

title: Paneer Tikka
description: Chunks of marinated paneer grilled to perfection, served with mint chutney.

title: Chicken Shawarma Roll
description: Grilled chicken wrapped in flatbread with garlic mayo, veggies, and spices.

title: Mutton Rogan Josh
description: Slow-cooked mutton curry infused with Kashmiri red chilies and aromatic spices.

title: Chicken 65
description: Spicy deep-fried chicken chunks tossed in curry leaves, garlic, and red chili.
